mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM client WHERE cId=#{ clientId } AND cId NOT IN (SELECT wcId FROM withdraw_info)
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET cNum=#{ clientNum }, cEmail=#{ clientEmail }, cEmailCheck=#{ clientEmailCheck } WHERE cId=#{ clientId }
UPDATE client SET cPwd=#{ clientPwd } WHERE cId=#{ clientId }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client(cId, cPwd, cName, cNum, cEmail, cEmailCheck, cRecId, cBirth, cNickName, grId, cPoint) VALUES(#{ clientId }, #{ clientPwd }, #{ clientName }, #{ clientNum }, #{ clientEmail }, #{ clientEmailCheck }, #{ clientRecId }, #{ clientBirth }, #{ clientNickName }, #{ gradeId }, #{ clientPoint })
